short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Put yourself into pause (or unpause) directly from the browser. Make calls using Thulium calls via the context menu on any web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cut down on bothersome tasks like searching for the right tab, improve your agent productivity and save time in just two clicks!

Thulium is a browser-based omnichannel customer support system.

More at https://thulium.com
